description.zh: Verdaccio 是一个轻量级的本地私有 npm 仓库工具，无需复杂配置即可使用。它支持管理私有包、缓存公共 npm 仓库内容，并可通过代理连接多个仓库。内置小型数据库，并可通过插件扩展存储能力。
description.en: Verdaccio is a lightweight, zero-config-required local private npm registry. It allows users to manage private packages, cache public npm registry content, and proxy multiple registries. It comes with a built-in tiny database and supports plugins for extended storage capabilities.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 轻量级设计，零配置即可快速部署
- 同时支持私有仓库和公共仓库的代理缓存
- 支持 npm、pnpm 和 Yarn 等多种包管理器
- 可通过插件扩展功能，灵活定制
- 被多个主流开源项目广泛用于端到端测试

## 功能列表:

- 安装和发布私有包
- 缓存 npmjs.org 上的包，降低延迟，提升可靠性
- 代理并链接多个仓库
- 用本地版本覆盖公共包
- 支持用户管理（添加用户、修改密码、令牌管理）
- 支持 CI 环境下的端到端测试
- 兼容 npm 高级功能（unpublish、dist-tag、deprecate、audit）
- 安全功能包括审计和漏洞报告
- 提供 Docker 和 Helm 支持，便于部署
- 插件系统支持与 Amazon S3、Google Cloud Storage 等服务集成
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Lightweight and easy to set up with zero configuration
- Acts as both a private registry and a caching proxy for public registries
- Supports multiple package managers including npm, pnpm, and Yarn
- Extensible via plugins for storage and custom functionality
- Widely adopted by major open-source projects for end-to-end testing

## Features:

- Install and publish private packages
- Cache packages from npmjs.org to reduce latency and improve reliability
- Proxy and link multiple registries
- Override public packages with local versions
- Support for user management (add user, change password, token management)
- End-to-end testing support for CI environments
- Compatibility with advanced npm features (unpublish, dist-tag, deprecate, audit)
- Security features including audit and vulnerability reporting
- Docker and Helm support for easy deployment
- Plugin system for integration with services like Amazon S3 and Google Cloud Storage
